Content:
@Wardog So
**IsMultiplayer **will execute on Client & Server ?
**IsServer **will execute only on Server (with or without connected to steam) and being ignored on Client ?
**IsDedicated **will only execute on Server connected to steam ?

Author: wrdg
Content: IsServer can execute in offline mode on the client, since the game is running both the server and client

Author: wrdg
Content: if you don't completely understand it just use `if (GetGame().IsDedicatedServer())` for server and `if (!GetGame().IsDedicatedServer())` for client

Author: wrdg
Content: if a method executes on both client and server, and you want that to happen you don't need to do a check

Author: wrdg
Content: any kind of mod development you be developing for multiplayer, unless your mod is specifically built for offline mode

Author: wrdg
Content: so don't develop using offline mode or you're going to most likely have issues you can't solve because it works in offline mode but not on a server
